contentList.content: Make a weapon attack using your <LSTag Tooltip="[1]">[2]</LSTag> for the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> and damage rolls. Deals an extra [3].
Toggle treating weapon attacks as casts of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DWE_TrueStrike">True Strike</LSTag>, when applicable.

Requires Script Extender!
If already installed, enable its console and check for errors there.
Compatible melee attacks will be treated as <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DWE_TrueStrike_Melee">True Strike</LSTag>.
Compatible ranged attacks will be treated as <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DWE_TrueStrike_Ranged">True Strike</LSTag>.
Melee weapon damage dealt by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DWE_TrueStrike_Melee">True Strike</LSTag> will be converted to Radiant.
Ranged weapon damage dealt by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_DWE_TrueStrike_Ranged">True Strike</LSTag> will be converted to Radiant.
